greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: Sum_{n>=0} x^(n^2-n) / (1 + x^n)^n.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2050
formula: G.f.: Sum_{n>=0} x^n * (x^n - 1)^n.  - _Paul D. Hanna_, May 30 2018
program: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A=1); A = sum(k=1, sqrtint(n)+1, x^(k^2-k) / (1 + x^k +x*O(x^n) )^k ); polcoeff(A, n)}
(PARI) {a(n) = local(A=0); A = sum(k=1,n+1, x^(-k)/(1 + x^(-k) +x*O(x^n) )^k ); polcoeff(A, n)}
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jul 17 2015
